articles.title: Germany’s Merkel Hands Over Chancellor’s Office to Scholz - The New York Times
articles.description: Chancellor Olaf Scholz and his new cabinet were sworn in, beginning a new chapter for Europe’s largest democracy. Angela Merkel wished him well and called the chancellorship “one of the most beautiful duties there are.”
articles.content: For the photographer Herlinde Koelbl, the end of Angela Merkels tenure as Germanys chancellor isnt just the end of a political era its also the end of one of the longest-running art projects in world… [+3083 chars]

articles.title: Inside the cryptocurrency scam: 'Frank' explains how European scammers target Australians for millions - ABC News
articles.description: After two years working in two separate European cybercrime "boiler rooms", Frank tells the ABC how he's scammed Australians.
articles.content:
If you answer your phone and Frank* is on the other end of the line, he'll keep you talking for as long as he can.
